posts.name: Buford Highway Farmers Market
posts.note: The Buford Highway Farmers Market is a spacious market with a global and ethnic focus in the selection of produce, meats, and seafood.

posts.name: Busy Bee Cafe
posts.add1: 810 Martin Luther King Jr Dr NW
posts.note: Busy Bee Cafe is a circa-1947 downtown classic that still serves traditional soul food at budget prices in a cozy storefront. You need to order the fried chicken.

posts.name: Callie’s Hot Little Biscuit
posts.note: Callie’s Hot Little Biscuit is a snug counter serve featuring several types of biscuits, plus grab-and-go sandwiches, coffee and tea. Order the cheddar country ham biscuit which contains butter and cream cheese. For dessert get the peach biscuit.

posts.name: El Taco Veloz
posts.note: El Taco Veloz strives to deliver the best in high-value, low-priced authentic Mexican food. NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Fat Matt's Rib Shack
posts.note: Fat Matt's Rib Shack is a no-frills counter-service beer and BBQ joint with nightly live blues music.

posts.name: Folk Art
posts.note: Folk Art is a brick-walled spot with vintage decor whipping up home-style fare and cocktails with a stylish twist. You should order the meatball burger which comes with three patties, sauteed onions, and mushrooms.

posts.name: Heirloom Market BBQ
posts.note: Heirloom Market BBQ is a tiny eatery with a single communal table offering BBQ and burgers with a slight Asian accent. You should get the spicy BBQ sandwich.

posts.name: Holeman and Finch
posts.note: Holeman and Finch is a modern gastropub with new takes on vintage eats such as deviled eggs, plus custom cocktails. At 10:00 PM they serve a limited amount number of cheeseburgers which go quickly because people's main reason of being there is to get one of them.

posts.name: Silver Skillet
posts.note: Silver Skillet is a go-to for Southern breakfasts since 1956 with country-fried fare set in vintage decor. They've been serving all the stick-to-your-ribs classics, including the famed Lemon Icebox Pie and grits and ham. You need to order the biscuits or the pies.

posts.name: Sublime Doughnuts
posts.note: Sublime Doughnuts is a quaint shop doing donuts in a variety of adventurous flavors like maple-bacon-cheddar and red velvet. NOTE: They have multiple locations.
